nodes.text: Tal Veridian was a female resident of Cloud City on Bespin during the time of the Galactic Empire. She regarded herself as Lando Calrissian's second command, and was present after several members of the Rebel Alliance escaped from the city along with Calrissian, leaving its residents under Imperial control. Although she was affiliated with the rebels, her lover was Lieutenant Ela Radodan, an Imperial officer. Radodan secretly informed Veridian of Imperial activities as they conspired together to free a group of Tibanna gas miners from the Empire.
